headers.To: T {[}]o: McAlynn, Michael; Ploch, Krzysztof; Bryson, Michael; Crooks, Philip; Getty, Trevor; Comac, Christopher Jam; Smith, Conal
headers.Subject: Su:;@'~#bject: FW: Artifactory outage

email.body:
They’ve finally updated Artifactory so we can use Docker 1.10 now.
From: Haridoss, Rajesh Sent: 14 April 2016 2:20 AM To: ASPEn Dev Admin <aspen-dev-admin@hpe.com>; ASPEn Dev Apps <aspen-dev-apps@hpe.com>; ASPEn Dev Core <aspen-dev-core@hpe.com>; ASPEn QA <aspen-qa@hpe.com>; Puccianti, Sylvain B <sylvain.puccianti@hpe.com>; Mazumdar, Shashi <shashi.mazumdar@hpe.com>; Correa, Victor <victor.correa@hpe.com>; Ghosh Dastidar, Kusuma <vgkusuma@hpe.com>; Jagadevan, Kamal <kamalakannan.jagadevan@hpe.com>; Jain, Rahul (Rahul Jain) <rahul.jain2@hpe.com>; Zhao, Yu SOBO <yu.zhao3@hpe.com>; Nair, Rajat <rajat.nair@hpe.com>; Teplitsky, Alexander <alexander.teplitsky@hpe.com>; Labriola, Jason <jason.labriola@hpe.com>; Momin, Orko <orko.momin@hpe.com>; Vardham, Nalini K <nalini.k.vardham@hpe.com>; Hardy, Dermot <dermot.hardy@hpe.com>; Duewer, Rob <rob.duewer@hpe.com> Subject: RE: Artifactory outage
Outage completed.
Artifactory is upgraded to version 4.7.1 and it is compatible with Docker 1.10.X .
Also, Docker daemon used by the Jenkins CI server is upgraded to Docker 1.10.3
Thanks,
-Rajesh
From: Haridoss, Rajesh Sent: Wednesday, April 13, 2016 1:51 PM To: ASPEn Dev Admin <aspen-dev-admin@hpe.com <mailto:aspen-dev-admin@hpe.com> >; ASPEn Dev Apps <aspen-dev-apps@hpe.com <mailto:aspen-dev-apps@hpe.com> >; ASPEn Dev Core <aspen-dev-core@hpe.com <mailto:aspen-dev-core@hpe.com> >; ASPEn QA <aspen-qa@hpe.com <mailto:aspen-qa@hpe.com> >; Puccianti, Sylvain B <sylvain.puccianti@hpe.com <mailto:sylvain.puccianti@hpe.com> >; Mazumdar, Shashi <shashi.mazumdar@hpe.com <mailto:shashi.mazumdar@hpe.com> >; Correa, Victor <victor.correa@hpe.com <mailto:victor.correa@hpe.com> >; Ghosh Dastidar, Kusuma <vgkusuma@hpe.com <mailto:vgkusuma@hpe.com> >; Jagadevan, Kamal <kamalakannan.jagadevan@hpe.com <mailto:kamalakannan.jagadevan@hpe.com> >; Jain, Rahul (Rahul Jain) <rahul.jain2@hpe.com <mailto:rahul.jain2@hpe.com> >; Zhao, Yu SOBO <yu.zhao3@hpe.com <mailto:yu.zhao3@hpe.com> >; Nair, Rajat <rajat.nair@hpe.com <mailto:rajat.nair@hpe.com> >; Teplitsky, Alexander <alexander.teplitsky@hpe.com <mailto:alexander.teplitsky@hpe.com> >; Labriola, Jason <jason.labriola@hpe.com <mailto:jason.labriola@hpe.com> >; Momin, Orko <orko.momin@hpe.com <mailto:orko.momin@hpe.com> >; Vardham, Nalini K <nalini.k.vardham@hpe.com <mailto:nalini.k.vardham@hpe.com> > Subject: Artifactory outage
Artifactory (http://rh7-artifactory.hpswlabs.hp.com:8081/artifactory) is going down between 4:00pm and 6:00pm PST today ( 04/13) for an upgrade.
You may not be able to do maven builds and Docker registries will not be accessible during this time. You will get another notification at the end of the outage.
Please plan accordingly.
Thanks
-Rajesh
